descriptor.short_desc:
Product Description
Little's Poly Mini is a long lasting, economical and safe product that helps in comfortable and hygienic feeding.
Product Features

Littleâs Poly bottles are 3-in-1 bottles that come with a tumbler, sipper and a nipple.
Sipper helps easy drinking and tumbler acts as the first drinking cup of the baby.
The leak free cap fits the nipple perfectly in the bottle and the sealing disc prevents leakage.
Made from BPA free Food Grade Polypropene (PP) Material.
Easily sterilisable and reusable.
Passes through multiple point quality checks.

descriptor.name: Little's Soft Cleansing Baby Wipes | Contains Aloe Vera & Jojoba Oil -(30 Wipes*5)
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Description
Extra thick and soft for daily use. Wipes are untouched by hands. Dermatologist tested and alcohol free. Little's soft cleansing baby wipes is a 50: 50 blend of polyester and viscose. While both are manmade fibers, they offer a better Alternative to cotton.
Product Features

Little's Cleansing Baby Wipes are long, extra thick and extra moist for your baby's gentle skin.
Littleâs Baby Wipes are ideal for gently cleansing & moisturizing your babyâs delicate skin during diaper change or for cleaning your babyâs face & hands during playtime, mealtime & while travelling.
Enriched with the goodness of Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E, to ensure that your baby's skin remains soft and moisturized, while the gentle fragrance of the baby wipes keeps your baby fresh and happy all day long.
These wipes are free from parabens and alcohol, and contain hypoallergenic ingredients that are clinically tested to ensure that they do not cause any irritation to your baby.
Littleâs Wipes can also be used by adults to cleanse and freshen up, and are excellent for use by the whole family, anywhere & anytime.

Product Dimensions: 15.2 x 8.1 x 25.4 cm Weight: 1.8 Kilograms
Manufactured By: âWelspun India Ltd., Welspun City, Survey Nos. 666, 667, 675, 700, 775, Anjar, Kutch- 370110, Gujarat, IndiaMarketed By: Piramal Pharma LtdCountry of Origin: IndiaBest Before: 24 Months from the Manufacturing date

descriptor.name: Little's Organix Gentle Baby Powder I Contains Organic Aloevera & Neem Extract-400gm
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Description
Little's Organix Gentle Baby Powder is a fragrant talcum powder enriched with corn starch, an excellent absorbent that provides additional protection against wetness and ensures baby's skin remains soft, smooth & dry for longer. It has no parabens or pthalates which makes it safe to use on babies. This is ideal to use after bath, at every nappy change, and at bedtime. Regular use ensures no chafing, keeps baby fresh & happy for longer.
Product Features

Little's Organix Gentle Baby Powder is a fragrant talcum powder enriched with corn starch, an excellent absorbent that provides additional protection against wetness and ensures baby's skin remains soft, smooth & dry for longer.
No parabens or pthalates which makes it safe to use on babies.
Little's Organix Gentle Baby Powder is ideal to use after bath, at every nappy change, and at bedtime.
Regular use ensures no chafing, keeps baby fresh & happy.

Safety Information:
1) Avoid contact with eyes, mouth and nose, 2) In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water, 3) Discontinued use in case of irritation & consult doctor, 4) Avoid accidental inhalation and contact with broken, chapped skin & mucous membranes, 5) Keep out of reach of children
Directions:
Sprinkle powder on palms and apply gently on baby's skin after bath, nappy change and bedtime
Manufactured By: âShivom Industries, Plot No. 72, Govt. Industrial Estate, Village - Khadoli, Silvassa - 396230, D & NH, IndiaMarketed By: Piramal Pharma LtdCountry of Origin: IndiaBest Before: 24 Months from the Manufacturing date

descriptor.name: Little's Organix Moisturising Baby Cream (200 g  - Tube) with Organic Ingredients (Aloe Vera and Neem extract)
descriptor.short_desc:
Short Description
Little's Organix Moisturising Baby Cream is enriched with organic ingredients - Neem & Aloe Vera. It moisturizes and nourishes baby's skin keeping it soft and supple. It helps to restore natural protector barrier on baby's delicate skin.Ideal for daily use in all seasons.
Bullet Points
1. Enriched with safe and organic ingredients - Neem & Aloe Vera2. Non-sticky and light2. The moisturising properties of Aloe Vera keep the babyâs delicate skin soft and supple3. Neemâs natural anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory properties keep skin healthy4. Free from harmful ingredients like Parabens & Pthalates5. Dermatologically tested
Directions for use:
Take Little's moisturising baby cream into your hands and gently apply on baby's delicate skin
Safety Warning:
1. Avoid contact with eyes, mouth & nose2. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with water3. Discotinue use in case of irritation & consult doctor4. Keep out of reach of children5. For external use only
Additional Info

descriptor.name: Little's Organix Gentle Baby Liquid Detergent | Contains Organic Aloevera & Neem Extract-400gm
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Description
Little's Organix Gentle Baby Liquid Detergent is a safe and effective laundry wash for your baby's clothes. It is free of harmful ingredients like triclosan and is specially formulated with organic ingredients, neem and aloe vera that gently and thoroughly clean your baby's clothes by effectively removing stains while maintaining the softness of the fabric. It has a mild and fresh fragrance which helps in removing odour. It also helps in maintaining the colour of the fabric as it is free of bleach, brighteners and phosphates.
Product Features

Little's Organix Gentle Baby Liquid Detergent is a safe and effective laundry wash for your baby's clothes.
Free of harmful ingredients: No Parabens, Flourescent, Phosphates, bleach & brighteners.
Specially formulated with organic ingredients: Neem and Aloe vera extracts that gently and thoroughly clean your baby's clothes by effectively removing stains while maintaining the softness of the fabric.
It has a mild and fresh fragrance which helps in removing odour.
It also helps in maintaining the colour of the fabric as it is free of bleach, brighteners.
This detergent is suitable for both, hand wash & machine wash (Front load & Top load)

descriptor.name: Little's Organix Baby Shampoo | Contains Organic Aloevera and Neem Extract-400gm
descriptor.short_desc:
Product Description
Little's Organix Baby Shampoo is a safe and gentle shampoo for your baby. It is free of harmful ingredients and is enriched with organic ingredients, like Aloe vera and Neem. It is especially formulated to gently clean and nourish your baby's hair and scalp without causing any irritation. Little's Shampoo helps in maintaining the texture of the hair and gives the required softness, while maintaining a fresh fragrance.
Product Features

Little's Organix Baby Shampoo is a safe and gentle shampoo for your baby.
Free from harmful ingredients, No added Paraben and Phthalates.

Product Description
Little's Organix Baby Shampoo is a safe and gentle shampoo for your baby. It is free of harmful ingredients and is enriched with organic ingredients, like Aloe vera and Neem. It is especially formulated to gently clean and nourish your baby's hair and scalp without causing any irritation. Little's Shampoo helps in maintaining the texture of the hair and gives the required softness, while maintaining a fresh fragrance.

descriptor.name: Little's Colourful Activity Chain Links
descriptor.short_desc:
Short Description
Little's Colourful Activity Chain Links help develop color recognition, motor skills & hand eye coordination of the baby. It comes with 12 colorful square links that can be linked together to form various shapes
Bullet Points
1. Helps develop motor skills2. Helps develop color recognition3. Helps develop hand eye coordination4. Trying to make different shapes and match colors helps develop reasoning skills5. Helps develop concept of color and shape
Directions for use
1. De-assemble the plastic slices.2. Join the pieces to make a simple chain and different innovative shapes
Additional Info
